sentences.en: a strong correlation between urban deprivation and poor health
sentences.cn: 都市贫困和健康状况差之间的密切关系

sentences.en: A superficial glance at the table shows a strong correlation between the two sets of measurements.
sentences.cn: 粗看一下这张表就可以看出两组测量数据间有密切的相互关系.

sentences.en: Are you familiar with their correlation ?
sentences.cn: 你了解他们的相互关系吗？

sentences.en: Correlation of morphological factors with injury is important.
sentences.cn: 形态因素与受害的相互关系很重要.

sentences.en: If the two signals are random, the cross - correlation is zero.
sentences.cn: 倘若两个信号都是随机的, 则 互相关系数 为零.

sentences.en: Many factors will enter into any generalized correlation accounting for this behavior.
sentences.cn: 任何说明这种性状的通用关联式将包含许多因素.

sentences.en: Many other interesting correlation can be conjured up.
sentences.cn: 其他许多有意思的相互关系能被想象出来.

sentences.en: Our presentation of the literature has been aimed at pertinent interpretation and correlation of research findings.
sentences.cn: 我们提出这些文献的目的在于适当地解释并与研究结果相联系.

sentences.en: The coefficient of correlation, R, is obtained by taking the square root of R 2.
sentences.cn: 相关系数R是通过把R2开平方根求得的.

sentences.en: The correlation between skin cancer incidence and exposure to Ultraviolet radiation is given in Fig . 11 - 22.
sentences.cn: 图11-22中给出皮肤癌发病率与暴露紫外线辐射之间的关系.

sentences.en: the correlation between smoking and disease
sentences.cn: 吸烟和疾病之间的关联

sentences.en: The correlation covers a broad range of test materials.
sentences.cn: 这一相互关系式包含有范围广泛的实验材料.

sentences.en: The correlation is loose and the use for prediction insecure.
sentences.cn: 这种相关是不密切的,而且用来预测是靠不住的.

sentences.en: The greater the sum, the greater the cross - correlation coefficient obtained in this way will be.
sentences.cn: 和数越大, 以这种形式得到的相关系数也越大.

sentences.en: There is a close correlation between contour lines and lithology.
sentences.cn: 等值线的外形和岩性吻合的很好.

sentences.en: This result is achieved by oil / oil or gas / gas correlation.
sentences.cn: 通过石油/石油或天然气/天然气的对比便可得到这个结果.

sentences.en: We shall often find correlation between grammatical and semantic categories.
sentences.cn: 我们往往会发现语法范畴和语义范畴之间的相互联系.

words.tran_cn: （使）相关联；（使）相互对照（correlate的过去分词）
使有相互关系；互相有关系

phrases.tran_cn: 典型相关分析；典范相关分析
部份相关，偏相关；部分相关

trans.tran_en: a connection between two ideas, facts etc, especially when one may be the cause of the other
